weekly_top_story.headline: Ukraine Fires Justice and Energy Ministers Amid Major Corruption Scandal
weekly_top_story.summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky dismissed two key cabinet members following allegations of a massive bribery scheme, highlighting ongoing challenges to governance and transparency amid the country's war with Russia.

stories.headline: US Launches 'Operation Southern Spear' Targeting Alleged 'Narco-Terrorists' Across Hemisphere
stories.summary: The US has initiated a controversial new operation resulting in multiple strikes and significant international condemnation over extrajudicial killings, raising concerns about regional stability and human rights.

stories.headline: Russia Launches Massive Overnight Assault on Kyiv, Ukraine
stories.summary: Russia carried out a large-scale drone and missile attack on nearly every district of Ukraine's capital, killing at least six and injuring dozens, underscoring the continued intensity of the conflict.

stories.headline: Switzerland Announces $200 Billion Investment in US as Tariff Deal Finalized
stories.summary: Switzerland has agreed to invest $200 billion in the United States through 2028 as part of a new trade deal that significantly reduces US tariffs on Swiss goods, signaling a major shift in transatlantic economic relations.
